languages.text: Any ranged area and ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks of the Arch-Militant reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} of all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Все дистанционные атаки по области и дистанционные атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}, которые совершает архмилитант, уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} всех противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, на 10 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Any ranged area and burst attacks of the Veteran reduce Weapon Skill of all of the hit enemies by −20 until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Any ranged area and burst attacks of the Veteran reduce the Weapon Skill of all enemies hit by −20 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

languages.text: 首席战士所有远程范围攻击与远程{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击，都会使所有被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低10点，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Fernkampf-Flächen- und Fernkampf-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriffe{/g} des Erzmilitanten reduzieren die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} aller {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Gegner bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −10. Stapelt sich nicht.

languages.text: Başmilitan'ın her türlü menzilli alan ve menzilli {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırıları{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulan{/g} tüm düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliklerini 10 puan azaltır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
